verses.verse: A song of ascents. I lift up my eyes to the mountains;[b] from where will I receive help?
My help comes from the LORD, the Maker of heaven and earth.[c]
He will not permit your foot to stumble; he who guards you will not fall asleep.[d]
Indeed, the one who guards Israel never slumbers, never sleeps.[e]
[f]The LORD serves as your guardian; he is at your right hand to serve as your shade.
The sun will not strike you during the day, nor the moon during the night.
[g]The LORD will protect you against all evil; he will watch over your life.
The LORD will watch over your coming and your going both now and forevermore.
